taxonomicnotes: Chaudhuria caudata Annandale, 1918 was described from Inlé Lake, southern Shan States, Myanmar. The species possibly consists of multiple species (Kottelat 2001).
rationale: There is very little information about its population, range and threats, and the species as presently understood may represent a number of different species. It is therefore assessed as Data Deficient.
evaluator: Ng, H.H., Allen, D.J. & Kullander, S.O.
